rrpss

Class OrderInvoice

  • Object
    • OrderInvoice
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class OrderInvoice
extends Object
implements Serializable
    Stores information of all order invoices in the restaurant.

    This class will keep track of the purchases (Order) made by the customer, calculate the final price (grandTotal), and print the order invoice which consist of Order details and price breakdown.

    The price is broken down into:

    • TotalPrice: The price for all items that customer has to pay. This price is the sum of price x quantity of each item being ordered.
    • TotalGST: Goods and service tax of 7%
    • TotalDiscount: 10% discount entitled to members of the restaurant.
    • GrandTotal: The amount that customer will pay. This final price take accounts the GST and membership discount.
    Author:
    Deka Auliya Akbar
    See Also:
    Serializable, Serialized Form

    • Field Detail

      • GST

        private static final double GST
        Constant that represents the tax rate for Goods and Services Tax. The rate of this GST is 7%. The totalGST will be added to the grandTotal.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DISCOUNT

        private static final double DISCOUNT
        Constant that represents the discount rate entitled for the members in the restaurant. The discount rate is 10%. The totalDiscount will be subtracted from the grandTotal if a customer is a member in the Restaurant.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • totalPrice

        private double totalPrice
        Stores the gross price of an order. This price is the sum of the costs of all items in exist the order. The cost of each item is determined by multiplying the price of individual item with its requested quantities.

      • order

        private Order order
        Stores the Order object that customer has requested. This order will contain menu items that the customer purchased (AlaCarte and SetPackage) and its requested quantities, date and time of the Order creation, and the staff who created the Order. This object also has a print method to print out its details.

      • tableId

        private int tableId
        Stores the table number to indicate from which Table an Order is made.

      • membership

        private boolean membership
        Stores the membership status of the Customer.

      • totalDiscount

        private double totalDiscount
        Stores the discounted amount of price to be subtracted from grandTotal. It is calculated by multiplying DISCOUNT with the grandTotal.

        This totalDiscount will only be computed if the Customer is a member of the Restaurant, otherwise the value is 0 (no discount).

      • totalGST

        private double totalGST
        Stores the amount of tax to be added to the grandTotal. It is calculated by multiplying GST with grandTotal.

      • grandTotal

        private double grandTotal
        Stores the net price that a Customer has to pay. This net price have already subtracted the discount totalDiscount and added with the GST totalGST.

    • Constructor Detail

      • OrderInvoice

        public OrderInvoice(Order order,
            boolean membership,
            int tableId)
        Constructs an OrderInvoice object. This constructor will initialize the attributes of OrderInvoice.
        Parameters:
        order - is the Order objects, and assigned to order at initialization
        membership - is the membership status of a customer in the restaurant and assigned to membership
        tableId - is the identifier of the Table object and assigned to tableId

        totalPrice, grandTotal, totalGST and totalDiscount are initialized to 0. This constructor will evoke calculateTotalPrice() to compute the cost that a customer has to pay.

    • Method Detail

      • calculateTotalPrice

        public void calculateTotalPrice()
        Calculates the totalPrice, totalDiscount, totalGST and grandTotal.

        This method iterates through every menu item exists in the Order object, which are stored in HashMap data structures. For each item, the price will be multiplied with the requested quantity and the result is added up to the gross price (totalPrice).

        The net price (grandTotal) is computed by subtracting totalDiscount and adding the totalGST.

      • getOrder

        public Order getOrder()
        Returns Order object requested by the Cusomer.
        Returns:
        Order object made by the customer.

      • getTotalPrice

        public double getTotalPrice()
        Returns the total price (gross price) of all items purchased/ordered.
        Returns:
        the totalPrice of the purchase.

      • getTotalDiscount

        public double getTotalDiscount()
        Returns the discounted amount, the value is 0 if the Customer is not a member.
        Returns:
        the total discount.

      • getTotalGST

        public double getTotalGST()
        Returns the GST of the purchase.
        Returns:
        the total tax

      • getGrandTotal

        public double getGrandTotal()
        Returns the net price, which is the final amount of price the Customer has to pay.
        Returns:
        grandTotal of an Order object.

      • printInvoice

        public void printInvoice()
        Prints the Order details. This method prints every menu item and the respective quantity that the Customer has ordered, the date and time when the Order is created, and display the price breakdown, which consists of the gross price (totalPrice), membership discount (totalDiscount), tax(totalGST), and the net price (grandTotal).
